sentences.en: a show with lots of audience participation
Autophagy, appears to involve an active participation of the vacuolar membranes.
sentences.cn: 自体吞噬似乎与液泡膜的积极参加有关.

sentences.en: entertainment with plenty of audience participation
sentences.cn: 有许多观众参与的娱乐活动

sentences.en: His participation in actual physical surveys stimulated his interest in differential geometry.
sentences.cn: 他亲身参加实际的物理测量,激起了他对微分几何学的兴趣.

sentences.en: Let all participation in the ministry of the cathedral service be refused to him.
sentences.cn: 凡是他想要参加大教堂礼拜式牧师工作的要求,我们都拒不同意.

sentences.en: Must we guarantee in any way our participation in the tender?
sentences.cn: 我们应为参加投标做什么保证 吗 ?

sentences.en: Only in this way can the critical mass of participation be reached.
sentences.cn: 只有这样才能凑足参与人数。

sentences.en: Participation is encouraged at all levels.
sentences.cn: 鼓励各级人士都来参与。

sentences.en: Some of the magic tricks called for audience participation.
sentences.cn: 有些魔术要求有观众的参与.

sentences.en: The agreement encourages worker participation in management decisions.
sentences.cn: 该协议鼓励工人参与管理层的决策。

sentences.en: The blackman shrank from any direct participation in politics.
sentences.cn: 这位黑人回避直接插足政治.

sentences.en: Their participation is subject to a number of important provisos.
sentences.cn: 他们的参与受一些重要条款的限制。

sentences.en: They wanted more direct participation in the solution of steel production problems.
sentences.cn: 他们要求更多地直接参与解决钢铁生产的问题.

sentences.en: What the author of primitive mentality means by " participation " is familiar enough.
sentences.cn: 原始心理的创始人采用 “ participation ” (参与)的含义是十分通俗的.

sentences.en: Will severe selection standards create elitism and threaten the Olympic ethic of participation?
sentences.cn: 严格的选拔标准是否会造成精英主义，进而危及奥林匹克重在参与的理念呢？

sentences.en: Your participation will contribute a lot to our future cooperation.
sentences.cn: 你们的参与将会极大地促进我们今后的合作.

words.tran_cn: 由多人一起参加的；（股票等）持有人有权分享利益的
供人分享的；吸引参与的

phrases.tran_cn: 参与股权；股东权益分享

trans.tran_en: the act of taking part in an activity or event
